remarks: Scalar multiplication in a free module.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
frlmvscafval.y $e |- Y = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmvscafval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
frlmvscafval.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
frlmvscafval.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
frlmvscafval.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. K ) $.
frlmvscafval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
frlmvscafval.v $e |- .xb = ( .s ` Y ) $.
frlmvscafval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
frlmvscafval $p |- ( ph -> ( A .xb X ) = ( ( I X. { A } ) oF .x. X ) ) $.
